name: translate
description: This function requests a translation between two languages, and should only be selected when a translation is needed.

params.text: The text string to be translated.
params.source_lang: The language of the text string, fully written out, no abbreviations (i.e. 'english').
params.target_lang: The target language to be translated to, fully written out, no abbreviations (i.e. 'japanese').
